meanings.definition: A belief or judgment about something.
meanings.sent1: Her opinions on the movie were positive.
meanings.sent2: Everyone has different opinions on the best flavor of ice cream.
meanings.sent3: His strong opinions on fashion always make us smile.
meanings.sent4: In a world of black and white, her opinions added a splash of color.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's opinions on education were as clear as a sunny day.

meanings.definition: A view or perspective on a particular matter.
meanings.sent1: My opinions on the topic have evolved over time.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed their opinions on the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: His opinions on aliens visiting Earth were out of this world!
meanings.sent4: Her opinions on life were like a compass guiding her through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The artist's opinions on art were as unique as a fingerprint.
